about_the_game:
Eons Away is a beautifully hand-drawn RPG set in the mystical land of Orya, where you'll embark on an epic quest to combat corruption across time. Immerse yourself in a rich narrative and engaging gameplay as you explore, socialize, and battle your way to uncover Orya's secrets.

Engaging Turn-Based Combat

Engage in classic turn-based battles enhanced by a unique corruption system. Cleanse opponents from corruption or harness their power for strategic advantage.

Soulpact System

Forge soulpacts with summonable creatures. Each soulpact grants unique abilities, adding depth and variety to your combat strategy.

Morality System

Your actions shape your moral alignment, whether you choose righteousness or darker decisions. The morality system tracks your choices, impacting the story and character relationships.

Recruit Allies

Meet and recruit unique allies, each with their own backstories and abilities. Develop these relationships to unlock new abilities, embark on special quests, and explore deeper personal stories.

Explore Orya

Traverse the beautifully hand-drawn world of Orya, filled with lush forests, ancient temples, and vibrant landscapes. Discover hidden secrets, and delve into the rich lore that shapes this enchanting land.

Embark on a time-traveling journey with a diverse group of companions to save Orya from the encroaching darkness. Can you harness the power of the Eye of Orion and restore balance to the world? The fate of Orya is in your hands.

Features

  • Traditional turn-based combat with a unique corruption system.
  • Cleanse corrupted creatures or harness their power.
  • Allies can become corrupted and receive combat penalties
  • A Morality system measures your moral alignment based on your actions.
  • Recruit and manage unique allies.
  • Explore and discover the secrets of Orya.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista, Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8/8.1 (32/64bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo E8200 @ 2.6 GHz or AMD Athlon II X2 240 @ 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8800 GT or AMD Radeon HD2900 XT (512MB VRAM with Shader Model 4.0 or higher)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse required, optional Microsoft XBOX360 controller or compatible

short_description: Eons Away is a solo-developed, turn-based RPG with unique combat mechanics. Explore a vibrant, handpainted world overshadowed by an encroaching corruption. Every decision is important, be it how you fight your battles or the bonds you make. Choose your path wisely.
